channel.title: Staff Crowns
channel.description:
Hey there, Im adding a new yell system into my 317 project insanity - hyperion game engine but i want to add the mod icons instead of newby text with all different colors. Ive tryed <img=1> etc but they dont work and ive tryed @cr1@ etc and that dont work either.
Anyone know a way on how to get these icons to be there, If you do please comment below.
Thanks.
